db:abstract.db:para: The QVideoEncoderSettings class provides a set of video encoder settings.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A video encoder settings object is used to specify the video encoder settings used by QMediaRecorder. Video encoder settings are selected by constructing a QVideoEncoderSettings object, setting the desired properties and then passing it to a QMediaRecorder instance using the QMediaRecorder::setEncodingSettings() function.

db:section.db:title: QVideoEncoderSettings::QVideoEncoderSettings()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a null video encoder settings object.

db:section.db:title: QVideoEncoderSettings::QVideoEncoderSettings(const QVideoEncoderSettings &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the video encoder settings object other.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QVideoEncoderSettings::~QVideoEncoderSettings()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a video encoder settings object.

db:section.db:title: int QVideoEncoderSettings::bitRate() const
db:section.db:para: Returns bit rate of the encoded video stream in bits per second.

db:section.db:title: QString QVideoEncoderSettings::codec() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the video codec.

db:section.db:title: QMultimedia::EncodingMode QVideoEncoderSettings::encodingMode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the video encoding mode.

db:section.db:title: QVariant QVideoEncoderSettings::encodingOption(const QString &option) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the value of encoding option.

db:section.db:title: QVariantMap QVideoEncoderSettings::encodingOptions() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the all the encoding options as QVariantMap.

db:section.db:title: qreal QVideoEncoderSettings::frameRate() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the video frame rate.

db:section.db:title: bool QVideoEncoderSettings::isNull() const
db:section.db:para: Identifies if a video encoder settings object is uninitalized.
Returns true if the settings are null, and false if they are not.

db:section.db:title: QMultimedia::EncodingQuality QVideoEncoderSettings::quality() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the video encoding quality.

db:section.db:title: QSize QVideoEncoderSettings::resolution() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the resolution of the encoded video.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setBitRate(int value)
db:section.db:para: Sets the bit rate of the encoded video stream to value.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setCodec(const QString &codec)
db:section.db:para: Sets the video codec.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setEncodingMode(QMultimedia::EncodingMode mode)
db:section.db:para: Sets the video encoding mode.
If QMultimedia::ConstantQualityEncoding is set, the quality encoding parameter is used and bit rate is ignored, otherwise the bitrate is used.
The rest of encoding settings are respected regardless of encoding mode.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setEncodingOption(const QString &option, const QVariant &value)
db:section.db:para: Set the encoding option value.
The supported set and meaning of encoding options are system and selected codec specific.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setEncodingOptions(const QVariantMap &options)
db:section.db:para: Replace all the encoding options with options.
The supported set and meaning of encoding options are system and selected codec specific.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setFrameRate(qreal rate)
db:section.db:para: Sets the video frame rate.
A value of 0 indicates the encoder should make an optimal choice based on what is available from the video source and the limitations of the codec.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setQuality(QMultimedia::EncodingQuality quality)
db:section.db:para: Sets the video encoding quality.
Setting the video quality parameter allows backend to choose the balanced set of encoding parameters to achieve the desired quality level.
The quality settings parameter is only used in the constant quality encoding mode. The quality settings parameter is only used in the constant quality encoding mode.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setResolution(const QSize &resolution)
db:section.db:para: Sets the resolution of the encoded video.
An empty QSize indicates the encoder should make an optimal choice based on what is available from the video source and the limitations of the codec.

db:section.db:title: void QVideoEncoderSettings::setResolution(int width, int height)
db:section.db:para: Sets the width and height of the resolution of the encoded video.
This is an overloaded function.

db:section.db:title: bool QVideoEncoderSettings::operator!=(const QVideoEncoderSettings &other) const
db:section.db:para: Determines if other is of equal value to a video encoder settings object.
Returns true if the settings objects are not of equal value, and false if they are of equal value.

db:section.db:title: QVideoEncoderSettings &QVideoEncoderSettings::operator=(const QVideoEncoderSettings &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the value of other to a video encoder settings object.

db:section.db:title: bool QVideoEncoderSettings::operator==(const QVideoEncoderSettings &other) const
db:section.db:para: Determines if other is of equal value to a video encoder settings object.
Returns true if the settings objects are of equal value, and false if they are not of equal value.
